time_markers.text: four days prior to the election
quotes: The awarding of the Nobel Peace Prize to Sirleaf four days prior to the election sparked criticism from opposition parties
She took the presidential oath for her second presidency on 16 January 2012.
A fire broke out at the Executive Mansion on 26 July 2006, seriously damaging the structure.
In the late evening hours of 13 January 2018, she along with some officials of the Unity Party were expelled

organizations.name: Congress for Democratic Change
quotes: Congress for Democratic Change candidate Winston Tubman calling the award 'undeserved' and 'a political interference in our country's politics.'

quotes: In the late evening hours of 13 January 2018, she along with some officials of the Unity Party were expelled by the National Executive Committee of the party
